Horses get a number of health benefits from eating grass, including improved digestion, increased energy, and improved coat condition. Grass is also an important source of essential vitamins and minerals.

Grass provides horses with many essential nutrients, including vitamins, minerals, proteins, and carbohydrates. Eating grass helps horses maintain healthy digestive systems, strengthens their immune systems, and helps them to stay hydrated. Additionally, grazing on grass helps horses keep their teeth healthy and provides them with natural fiber for nutrition.
